mapper.select: SELECT registStatus FROM user WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET pw=#{pw}, email=#{email}, tel=#{tel} WHERE id=#{id}

UPDATE user SET registStatus= CASE WHEN registStatus = 'approve' THEN 'denied' WHEN registStatus = 'denied' THEN 'approve' END, regDate= CASE WHEN registStatus = 'approve' THEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR) WHEN registStatus = 'denied' THEN 'X' END WHERE id=#{id}
